question:
You have seen an advertisement for part-time job at a restaurant and want to apply for it.

Write a letter to the manager. In your letter:
describe your experience
tell him why you are interested in the job
say why you think you would be suitable for the job
text: My name is Valli, and I came across your recent advertisement regarding the position available for an assistant manager to work in the evening hours. So, I am writing to apply for this part-time job in your restaurant.

Certainly, I have been pursuing my masters in business administration because of my passion towards management field. Moreover, I have done my Diploma in hotel management. This gives me an adequate basic and informed knowledge about certain aspects of the hotel field.

Since, the working hours are after post lunch, I could be able to work after my study hours. In addition to that, this job would provide me with a certain practical experience, it would be highly helpful in studies as well as financial aspects.

On the whole, being an epitome of sincerity and diligence, I would be an efficient candidate for this respective position. Finally, nevertheless, I have a decent career qualification which I could use in order to enhance your restaurant's reputation.
I am looking forward to your reply and perhaps meeting for an interview.
